Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii



 I noticed that the crawler (H-3.0.0)  after staying up for few days and running 
fine on many jobs, stops to discover links on new jobs all of a sudden, one 
day. This is very rare though.
My crawler was up for last 1 month, did a good job on a dozens of crawl jobs. 
But since last week it had been failing to discover and extract links 'L' even 
on the previously nicely done jobs. Killed it and restarted, everything back to 
normal.

Any possible explanation?
Our system guys did some apache installation on the same machine couple of days 
back. Will that affect the already running crawler in anyway?

Thanks!
Pranay


      
--0-1597307115-1295971975=:18571
